name: Rubber Ducks Tell No Tales
description:
You are the spirit residing in the rubber ducky of Bob, junior programmer at the Unseen Code Company. Your job is to destroy evil bug spirits before they enter Bob's head and contaminate his code.

Changelog

V 0.90:

  • Changed resolution of the game
  • Halved the insane mouse sensitivity

Known Bugs

  • If you score 100%, the score does not display on the game over screen
